trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 提供可讓多個選取的項目控制項的抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the MultiSelector class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: 當您從 MultiSelector 類別衍生一個類別時，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>屬性`true`允許多重選取項目在控制項中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>是抽象類別，而且無法直接執行個體化。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: 啟動新的選取範圍交易。

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdateSelectedItems method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdateSelectedItems 方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>至`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>當呼叫此方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在多個項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>可以選取一次。

trans-unit.source: Set the CanSelectMultipleItems property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: 將在 CanSelectMultipleItems 屬性設定為`true`為允許多重選取該類別衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果多個項目中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>可以選取一次; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 認可至選取的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>至`false`並更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>當呼叫此方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>目前正在執行的大量更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法會將設定 IsUpdatingSelectedItems `true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法會將設定 IsUpdatingSelectedItems `false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>目前正在執行的大量更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>集合; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目中的所有<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>選取的。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the SelectedItems collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>是`false`，您無法將多個項目加入 SelectedItems 集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做的嘗試會造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>選取的。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取所有項目中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，而不論是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>是`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>
